testSteps.description: Given Martin wants to register a new Employee information

testSteps.description: Then the employee should be registered

children.description: For Martin: the response status code should be 200
For Martin: Employee Id should not be empty
For Martin: Employee name should be **Lauretta Jakubowski II-1572634678**
For Martin: Employee age should be **37**
